events.message: The policyholder reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving a rear-end impact.
The claim was reviewed and classified under Auto Accident cluster based on the damages involving the vehicle.
An agent specializing in automobile claims was assigned to handle this case promptly for better service.
A formal acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps.
Requested police report, vehicle registration, and photographs of the damaged vehicle to support claim processing.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including the accident report and car repair estimates.
Investigation began focusing on verifying the circumstances surrounding the collision and vehicle damage.
Investigation confirmed the liability and validated the extent of the vehicle damages as reported.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and car rental reimbursement during repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the clear communication throughout process.
Approval was granted for the settlement amount to be disbursed to cover all repair expenses.
Payment was processed and sent via direct deposit to the customer's bank account as agreed.
The claim was officially closed after successful payment and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
All case files and documentation were archived securely for any future reference or audit requirements.
